extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     (STAT361 or ECON351) and (STAT363 or STAT463), permission of the Department.

basic.description:
Introduces the theory and application of survival analysis: survival distributions and their applications, parametric and nonparametric methods, proportional hazards models, counting process and proportional hazards regression, planning and designing clinical trials. Given jointly with STAT 886/3.0.
RECOMMENDATION    STAT 462/3.0.
basic.subject: STAT
basic.title: Survival Analysis
